700059f-a.text:
E. 136th Street, south side, west from Lincoln Avenue. The W.P.A. signs indicate that a sidewalk repair job is
to be started here.
May 17, 1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project

701403f-a.text:
Lincoln Ave., east side, south from (No. 170) but not including East 136th Street.  In the center of the view is visible the clearance between East 135th and 134th Streets which will be constructed into the westerly approach to the Triborough Bridge, and in the background appears the Third Ave. Elevated Line bridge across the Harlem River.

July 29, 1937.

F.L.[? possibly P. L.] Sperr.
